jcr:content.jcr:title: G600 - Antivenom
jcr:content.seoDescription: With 20 buttons, the G600 MMO Gaming Mouse is the most customizable and easy to use mouse specifically designed for your favorite MMOs. Learn more.

media_tile.text: Pre-configured for optimal MMO use right out of the box. G600 includes three primary buttons, 12 thumb buttons, a clickable scroll wheel that tilts and a G-switch to double down and dominate. Use optional Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) for full programmability and customization.

media_tile_654806920.text: Put immediate access to all 12 primary MMO skills under your thumb. The unique dual-dish design of the thumb panel was developed with direct input from both MMO gamers and leading MMO game developers. Field-testing led to two carefully positioned sets of six buttons, helping to reduce both learning time and action timings. And the actuation force is carefully tuned to minimize misclicks.

media_tile_777233576.text: Use the G-Shift button to double the total number of customizable functions. In its default setting, holding the G-shift button down activates a second function to each G-key. Or set G-Shift to temporarily change DPI settings for extra cursor precision.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile_842265300.text: Use LIGHTSYNC technology to customize the thumb panel lighting for a clear visual reference of up to 3 active profiles and 3 different sub modes. With Logitech Gaming Software you can choose from approximately 16.8 million colors and assign a unique color to each profile, profile mode and mode style in the same game. Make colors pulse on-and-off or cycle continuously.

media_tile_779311277.text: Program up to three profiles with custom DPI settings to fit your favorite games, and save them right onboard so that when you take the G600 with you, your profile settings will go with to.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile_200728518.text: On-the-fly DPI shifting lets you toggle between two sensitivity settings with a click, from pixel-precise 250 DPI targeting to an blazing 8,200 DPI movement. Use LGS to customize the DPI settings to fit your style of play. Also, DPI cycling lets you choose from up to five DPI settings while in-game.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile_200728518_97201385.text: Gaming conditions torture typical mice. All three primary buttons are rated to a 20 million-click lifespan. Low-friction polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) feet are tested to last an amazing 250 km. G600 also has a braided 2 m (6.5 ft) USB cord with a hook-and-loop cable to keep things tidy and ready to play.

media_tile_200728518_1627199848.text: G600 is shaped for a natural contoured grip and maximum comfort. Every button is carefully positioned to reduce click fatigue while avoiding accidental actuations. Be the last gamer standing with G600.

media_tile_200728518_1947067780.text: When the difference between winning and losing is measured in pixels, laser sharp sensitivity pays off. G600 uses a gaming-grade laser that delivers precision at any hand speed and works across a wide range of surfaces to register even the most subtle hand movements.

media_tile_200728518_148094346.text: Be confident your every command is executed as fast as possible. The 1000 Hz report rate is up to eight times faster than a standard USB mouse. G600 captures your moves as fast as you can make them.

media_tile_200728518_2001761657.text: Use the optional Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) to perfectly match its commands to your favorite games. Simple drag-and-drop settings allow you to customize button and tracking profiles for any game you play. Or, use pre-configured customizations with automatic game detection.

_x0033_.text: Max. acceleration: > 30 GTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0034_.text: Max. speed: > 160 IPSTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0032_.text: PTFE Feet: 250-km rangeTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software (optional)
